article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XUiapj hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: Meet The Tiny Phone Maker That Thinks It Can Beat Samsung

div.p: It costs every company about the same to manufacture a phone. So what if you stripped out all of Samsung's unnecessary overhead? One man thinks you'd get a much better phone at a much better price.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XUiapj&via=Digg&text=Meet The Tiny Phone Maker That Thinks It Can Beat Samsung

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-105KZwX hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Porn Hurts Like Hell

div.p: The performers may look like they're in ecstasy, but the physical pain and endurance that goes into sex for the camera would make an NFL linebacker weep.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/105KZwX&via=Digg&text=Porn Hurts Like Hell

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-116OjGV hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Who Cleans Up After A Car Crash?

div.p: You might be one of those poor saps who rubbernecks at car wrecks on the side of the road. You've likely wondered how the whole crash site gets cleaned up, even all the little debris?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/116OjGV&via=Digg&text=Who Cleans Up After A Car Crash?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-107lwmT hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: I Am The Blogger Who Allegedly 'Complicated' The Steubenville Gang Rape Case – And I Wouldn't Change A Thing

div.p: I stayed up all night screen-grabbing tweets that joked about raping and urinating on a woman they thought might be dead. Welcome to Steubenville.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/107lwmT&via=Digg&text=I Am The Blogger Who Allegedly 'Complicated' The Steubenville Gang Rape Case – And I Wouldn't Change A Thing

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XT7wg9 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Diversity In Silicon Valley Is Apparently A 'Trade Secret'

div.p: How diverse is Silicon Valley? Most tech companies really, really don't want you to know, and the U.S. government isn't helping shed any light on the issue.

h2.a: How A Rooster Knows To Crow At Dawn

div.p: The animals know when it's daybreak even in a darkened room, study says.

div.p: People can correctly identify a wide range of dog emotions by sight.

h2.a: When Is A Spirit Too Old To Drink?

div.p: You've seen 50-year-old whiskeys that cost more than your monthly rent, but is it worth it? And can a spirit actually get too old to drink?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YjHYsk&via=Digg&text=When Is A Spirit Too Old To Drink?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-147CZzd hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Curiosity Rover Hits New Snag

div.p: A new glitch on NASA's Mars rover Curiosity has forced the vehicle to stay in safe mode longer than planned, stalling science operations for another couple of days, scientists said today.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/147CZzd&via=Digg&text=Curiosity Rover Hits New Snag

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15W8RER hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Steampunk Before Steampunk Existed

div.p: Charles Dellschau, a Prussian immigrant who came to the U.S. in 1853, was a butcher who lived in Houston. He spent the years between the turn of the century and his death in 1923 working on these scrapbooks, which combined news clippings, text, and art in visions of fantastic flying machines.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15W8RER&via=Digg&text=Steampunk Before Steampunk Existed

h2.a: 3D Printed Gun Maker Now Actually Licensed To Manufacture Guns

h2.a: A Guide To Web Security For Newbies

div.p: Most examinations of security and privacy online are written by geeks, and largely only readable by nerds. The problem with that approach, of course, is that most of us are neither.

header.div: AND YOU THOUGHT HE JUST MADE COMPUTERS

h2.a: Peek Inside The House That Woz Built

div.p: The difference between building the software behind an entire operating system and the design for a California mountainside mansion? Um, massive. Unless, that is, you happen to be Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/119QGws&via=Digg&text=Peek Inside The House That Woz Built

h2.a: A History Of Helicopter-Aided Jailbreaks

div.p: Two Quebec inmates made headlines around the world Sunday with their dramatic jailbreak after they were whisked from the prison grounds by a helicopter. As daring as the plan was, it’s hardly unique in the history of prison escapes.
